name: HRVAS
body:
### HRVAS: Heart Rate Variability Analysis Software

## Program Description:

HRVAS is a complete and self-contained heart rate variability (HRV) analysis software     (HRVAS) package. HRVAS offers several preprocessing options. HRVAS offers time-domeain, freq-domain, time-frequency, and nonlinear HRV analysis. All results can be exported to an Excel file. For processing many files HRVAS offers a bach processing feature. All settings/options can be saved to a .mat file and reloaded for future HRV analysis. Upon starting HRVAS all previously used settings/options are loaded.

## MATLAB Toolbox Dependencies:

    1. Signal Processing Toolbox (used for PSD estimates)
    2. Wavelet Toolbox (used for wavelet and wavelet packet detrending)
    3. Curvefitting Toolbox (only needed if using the "smooth" function for detrending)

## Contact Information:
